TopicTitle: KSP BoxSat A.02 Release Candidate Streaming on Twitch Tonight!

Articles.Content:
KSP BoxSat Streaming on Twitch Tonight!

Myself and Orcmaul will be streaming this evening in about about 20 minutes with the A.02 release candidate - join us for our late-night (hopeful) release party on Twitch. You'll likely be joined by 2 other people at this hour of the night, but it offers a unique chance to talk with the developers and get a sneak preview prior to release.
